descriptionlist.description:
Truly mute chats in Messages

Hates that badge count on Messages when muted chats arrive? Get this tweak. It'll automatically mark those messages as read. Features:
  • Auto mark muted chats ("Hide Alerts" in Messages) as read. Effectively remove its badge count

  • "Mark All as Read" force/haptic touch menu


This package tested to be working on iOS 13.5. Might or might not work on lower iOS version.
